Ann_Arbor.Ann Arbor Veterans Memorial Arena:
Ann Arbor Veterans Memorial Arena is a 800-seat indoor arena located in Ann Arbor, Michigan. It is used primarily for ice hockey, and is home to high school and recreational ice hockey teams.
https://www.a2gov.org/departments/parks-recreation/parks-places/veterans/Pages/default.aspx
It is part of Ann Arbor Veterans Memorial Park, and contains a Pro Shop, concessions and vending machines.
